all: ACC (if using A2 for buff reduction)

accuracy_resistance.clan_boss: No ACC needed unless using A2 for buff reduction

overview.best_dungeon_use: Clan Boss, Doom Tower, Iron Twins, Sand Devil

a1.name: Blade of Blessings
a1.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals lowest HP ally by 5% of their MAX HP (cannot heal self).

a2.name: Quest for Meaning
a2.notes: Attacks all enemies. Heals all allies by 15% of their MAX HP, decreases duration of all buffs on enemies by 1 turn, increases duration of all buffs on allies by 1 turn.

a3.name: Rise of Glory
a3.notes: Revives a dead ally with 50% HP, fills their Turn Meter by 50%, resets all their skill cooldowns.

passive.name: Guardian Angel
passive.effect: Increases healing received by 10%. If an ally is about to take a fatal hit, places Revive on Death on them for 1 turn before damage is taken. 7-turn cooldown (bookable to 4).

booking.impact: High for A2/A3 cooldowns, not needed for A1 utility.
booking.notes: Books mainly needed for cooldowns and more healing.

scenarios.bonus_damage: Extra damage on A1, more healing for team
scenarios.notes: Best for unkillable or super tanky teams.

clan_boss.notes: Provides healing, buff extension, and revive. Not a primary damage dealer.

synergy.relentless_viability: Good for more A2/A3 cycles, but not mandatory.

investment.notes: Top-tier for Clan Boss, Arena, Doom Tower, and Iron Twins.

gear_set_stability.Reflex: More A2/A3, but less overall stats

utility_comparison.comparison: Sandlashed offers Ally Protection, Aniri offers revive and more healing.
Duchess offers more protection, Aniri more healing and buff extension.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Warmaster for PvE, Timely Intervention for PvP
final_summary.damage_rotation: A2 for heal/buff, A3 for revive, A1 for single-target heal
final_summary.passive_impact: Unique preemptive revive, increases healing received
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: SPD, HP%, DEF%, RES, ACC (if using A2 for buff reduction)
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Works best with other buffers and revivers
final_summary.investment_value: Very high for all PvE content

team_setups.name: Clan Boss Support Team
team_setups.strategy: Buff extension, healing, revive, and protection.

similar_champions.similarity_reason: Both extend buffs and support team survival.
Both revive and support, but Aniri offers more healing.
